div.head: 喉中水雞鳴
div.div: water fowl chirping in the throat

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water fowl chirping in the throat

sense.def: Illness Sign of hectic, difficult breathing, with sounds emitted from the throat similar to the chirping of water fowl. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 10: 療上氣咳嗽，喉中水雞鳴，唾膿血腥 臭，麻黃湯方 , “To cure rising qi with cough, water fowl chirping in the throat , spitting of pus and blood with a malodorous stench: the recipe for a decoction with ma huang ”.
